K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:241b-1: a'arya aa pa ri mi ta aa yurdzny'a na hri da ya n'a ma dh'a ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:241b-3: 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:241b-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:241b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:241b-6: bcom ldan 'das gangg'a tas bskor ba'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:241b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams @242a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-1: la bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-3: 'di nas nub kyi phyogs rol na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-4: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-5: de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-7: su zhig de yi mtshan brjod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-8: de ni de ru skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-9: 'chi ba'i dus su ston pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-10: dge slong dge 'dun bcas te mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-11: de na bud med yod pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-12: mngal na gnas pa yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-13: rin chen rnams kyi padmo las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-15: zas dang gos dang sman rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-16: chos gos mal cha lhung bzed rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-17: sems kyis bsam ma thag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-19: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-20: bde ba can gyi bsngags pa brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-21: de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-22: sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-24: bsam mi khyab la dad byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-25: rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-26: rnam dag zhing du skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi pho brang 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-0: rgyar dpag tshad khri bzhi yod pa zhig @242b yod de; rgyal rigs su skyes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi yab ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-3: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang po'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-5: gzi brjid can zhes bya bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-7: rgyal rigs bzang skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sras ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-10: zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-12: snyan pa dri ma med ces bya bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shes rab can gyi mchog tu gyur pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-15: bzang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-16: rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-17: brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-18: bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi bdud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-21: mchod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-23: dang ba zhes bya bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:242b-26: nyan thos chen po drug khri yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243a-0: sems can thams cad kyis legs par bsams te de bzhin gshegs @243a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243a-1: pa tshe dpag med kyi mtshan legs par bzung la zhag bcur sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la ma yengs par bsgom zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med rgyun du yid la bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243a-2: dpal 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang rtag tu bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243a-3: nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum yang lag phyag byas la sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bsams na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243a-4: zhag bcu 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243a-5: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243a-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du yongs su bsngos na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243a-7: de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243a-10: 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-1: dzva la pa ra tstshe da ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-2: su kha ba ti ni rde she /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-4: a'a yurga rbha ni rah'a ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-7: nirbu dhi a'a k'a sha ni rdza te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-8: a'a k'a sha ni rde she //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-9: a'a k'a sha ni rku sha la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-10: a'a k'a sha ni rda rasha ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-11: a'a k'a sha aa dhishth'a ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-12: su kha ba ti aa dhi shth'a ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-14: tsa tv'a ri dharma pra sa dha ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-15: tsa tv'a ri a'arya sa tya pra s'a dha ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-16: tsa tv'a ri marga bha ba na pra s'a dha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-17: ba la p'irya pra s'a dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-20: ku sha la ni rde she /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-21: ku sha la pra tishth'a ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-34: ku le pra te ku le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-39: dharmme tsa dha rme ba le tsa ba le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-40: aa nu sha aa ba le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-41: buddha a'a k'a sha gu ne buddh'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-42: a'a k'a sha ni rgu ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:243b-43: aa mri ta du du bhi sva ra sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244a-0: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skad bstan pa de bzhin du kha ton byed pa des gos gtsang ma bgos te sa phyogs gtsang zhing dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs @244a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244a-1: pa tshe dpag med la me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244a-3: byang chub kyi snying po padma'i gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244a-4: byang chub kyi shing phun sum tshogs pa yang yid la bya'o; ;de la yang 'dod pa bskyed par byas te 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shing gi rgyal po ni rin po che'i padma rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba shing de me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244a-9: padma'i gad na ni dag cing gsal la bzang zhing bkra ba'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244a-10: rin po che du mas bskor ba la de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244a-11: g-yas na ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244a-12: g-yon na ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas bskor to; ;dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244a-14: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244a-16: gus pa mang ba de der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244a-17: gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la rin po che sna bdun gyi padma chen po dag la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244b-0: dge bsnyen ma gang la @244b la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i mtshan yang dag par 'dzin pa de la me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244b-4: gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244b-6: sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gang la yang ma gtogs so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244b-8: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244b-12: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244b-14: 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244b-15: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pun+ya sam bha wa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-040:244b-16: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o ////
